mapper.select: SELECT D.NO ,E.NAME WRITER_NO ,D.TITLE ,D."DATE" ,T."NAME" TYPE FROM AP_DOC D JOIN APPROVAL A ON D.NO = A.DOC_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON D.WRITER_NO = E.NO JOIN AP_TYPE T ON D."TYPE" = T."TYPE" WHERE ( (FINAL_DATE IS NULL AND FINAL_APPROVER = #{employeeNo}) OR (FIRST_DATE IS NULL AND FIRST_APPROVER = #{employeeNo}) OR (FIRST_DATE IS NOT NULL AND FINAL_APPROVER = #{employeeNo}) OR (FIRST_DATE IS NOT NULL AND SECOND_APPROVER = #{employeeNo}) OR (SECOND_DATE IS NOT NULL AND FINAL_APPROVER = #{employeeNo}) OR (SECOND_DATE IS NOT NULL AND THIRD_APPROVER = #{employeeNo}) OR (THIRD_DATE IS NOT NULL AND FINAL_APPROVER = #{employeeNo}) ) AND A.STATUS = '대기' ORDER BY D."DATE" DESC
SELECT * FROM APPROVAL WHERE DOC_NO = #{dno} AND STATUS = '대기'
SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE NO = #{writerNo} AND RESIGN_YN = 'N'
SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE NAME LIKE '%${approver}%'

UPDATE APPROVAL SET FIRST_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE "NO" = #{no}

UPDATE APPROVAL SET THIRD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE "NO" = #{no}
